title: Hour 3 - Ric Bucher (05-25-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Ric Bucher (05-25-20)
description:
With Dan & the Dannettes off, Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb fill in. They talk about Tiger Woods and Peyton Manning winning "The Match" over Phil Mickelson and Tom Brady. They discuss the return of the NBA season and where games will be played with NBA insider Ric Bucher. And they also debate paying college athletes and the potential problems that could arise.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
